CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By judicious selection of the donor and the acceptor units , the D-A copolymer architecture enables engineering of the electronic structure including energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) , the energy band gap , and light harvesting properties as well as charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| D-A copolymer |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) |
| lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By judicious selection of the donor and the acceptor units , the D-A copolymer architecture enables engineering of the electronic structure including energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) , the energy band gap , and light harvesting properties as well as charge transport properties.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| highest occupied molecular orbital ( HOMO ) |
| lowest unoccupied molecular orbital ( LUMO ) |
| energy band gap |
| light harvesting properties |
| charge transport properties |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| energy band gap |
| highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) |
| lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO) |

Note: The original paragraph mentioned "engineering of the electronic structure including energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) and the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO)", which can be considered as properties related to the material's electronic structure. Therefore, HOMO and LUMO are valid entities in this context. However, if the focus is only on material properties that can be measured or quantified independently of the specific molecular structure, then "energy levels of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO)" and "energy levels of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital (LUMO)" could be considered as redundant and less precise than just "HOMO energy level" and "LUMO energy level", respectively. In that case, the table could be updated accordingly.
